name: Anger Point
description: The Pokemon is angered when it takes a critical hit from physical move from opposing Pokemon, and that maxes its Attack stat. Boosts the Attack stat by one stage when hit by physical moves.

name: Battle Armor
description: Hard armor protects the Pokemon from critical hits. Takes 10% less damage.

name: Big Pecks
description: Powers up moves that make direct contact by 30%.

name: Color Change
description: The Pokemon's type becomes the type that counters the move used on it before hit.

name: Corrosion
description: The Pokemon can poison or attack the target even if it's a Steel or Poison type. Poison-type moves deals "super-effective" damage against Steel-type Pokemon.

name: Defeatist
description: Halves Atk & SpAtk at 1/3 HP (instead of 1/2 HP).

name: Flame Body
description: When a Pokemon with this Ability is hit by a move that makes contact, there is a 30% chance that the attacking Pokemon will become burned. If a Pokemon with this Ability uses a move that makes contact, there is a 30% chance the target will become burned.

name: Flare Boost
description: Special Attack stat increased by 50% when burned. Now immune to burn status damage.

name: Hyper Cutter
description: The Pokemon's proud of its powerful pincers. They prevent other Pokemon from lowering its Attack stat. Contact moves have its critical hit rate increased by 1.

name: Ice Body
description: Restores 1/8 HP every turn in hailstorm.

name: Illuminate
description: Boosts accuracy by 20%. Also has its existing field effect.

name: Illusion
description: 30% damage boost when in Illusion mode.

name: Immunity
description: The immune system of the Pokemon prevents it from getting poisoned. Takes 20% less damage from Poison-type moves.

name: Inner Focus
description: Protects the Pokemon from flinching, Focus Blast has increased accuracy to 90%.

name: Iron Barbs
description: When a Pokemon with this Ability is hit by a move that makes contact, the attacking Pokemon takes damage equal to 1/8 of its own maximum HP.

name: Keen Eye
description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's accuracy. +10% accuracy.

name: Levitate
description: By floating in the air, the Pokemon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves. Boosts the power of Flying-type moves by 25%.

name: Lightning Rod
description: The Pokemon draws in all Electric-type moves. Instead of being hit by Electric-type moves, it boosts its Attack or Sp. Attack stat (which is higher).

name: Limber
description: Its limber body protects the Pokemon from paralysis. Takes 30% less damage from crash damage.

name: Liquid Voice
description: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves and boosts them by 20%.

name: Long Reach
description: The Pokemon uses its moves without making contact with the target. If a physical move already doesn't make contact before applying this ability, boosts its damage by 20%.

name: Magma Armor
description: Prevents the Pokemon from becoming frozen or frostbite. Takes 30% less damage from Water- and Ice-type moves.

name: Mega Launcher
description: Powers up beam, pump, cannon, zooka, shot, gun, aura and pulse moves by 50%.

name: Merciless
description: The Pokemon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned or its Speed stat stage is -1 or lower.

name: Overcoat
description: Protects the Pokemon from things like sand, hail, and powder. The Pokemon takes 10% less damage from special moves.

name: Poison Point
description: 30% chance to get poisoned on contact against this Pokemon.

name: Poison Touch
description: May badly poison on contact.

name: Rain Dish
description: Restores 1/8 HP every turn when raining.

name: Rivalry
description: Attack & Special Attack is increased by 25% if the foe is of the same gender. No more penalty of other genders.

name: Rough Skin
description: This Pokemon inflicts 1/8 HP damage on contact (only defending).

name: Run Away
description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokemon. Boosts the Pokemon's Speed stat sharply when its stats are lowered.

name: Shell Armor
description: A hard shell protects the Pokemon from critical hits. Takes 10% less damage.

name: Shield Dust
description: Damaging moves used by the opponent will not have an additional effect. Now also avoids damage from entry hazards.

name: Solar Power
description: Ups Sp. Atk in the sun by 1.5x. No longer decreases HP at end of every sun turn.

name: Stamina
description: Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack. When it takes a critical hit, maxes its Defense stat.

name: Static
description: When a Pokemon with this Ability is hit by a move that makes contact, there is a 30% chance that the attacking Pokemon will become paralyzed. If a Pokemon with this Ability uses a move that makes contact, there is a 30% chance the target will become paralyzed.

name: Steely Spirit
description: Increases the power of Steel-type moves used by the user or any Ally Pokemon by 30%

name: Steelworker
description: Powers up Steel-type moves by 30%.

name: Storm Drain
description: Draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of being hit by Water-type moves, it boosts its Attack or Sp. Attack stat (which is higher).

name: Swarm, Torrent, Blaze, Overgrow
description: Now always provides a 20% damage boost to their move types. This increases to 50% while the Pokemon is at or below 1/3 HP. These boosts do not stack (the 50% boost replaces the 20% one while weakened).

name: Teravolt
description: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities. Adds the Electric-type to the Pokemon, in addition to the Pokemon's original type(s).

name: Toxic Boost
description: Attack stat increased by 50% when poisoned. Immune to poison status damage.

name: Turboblaze
description: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities. Adds the Fire-type to the Pokemon, in addition to the Pokemon's original type(s).

name: Water Compaction
description: When hit by a Water-type move, its Defense rises by +2. Reduces Water type damage by 50%.

name: Water Veil
description: Prevents the Pokemon from getting a burn. Sets Aqua Ring on entry. [Aqua Ring effect: Restore 1/8 HP every turn]

name: Zen Mode
description: Changes form regardless of health (So, becomes Zen Mode as soon as Darmanitan is switched in)

name: Aerodynamics
description: Boosts its Speed stat if hit by a Flying-type move instead of taking damage.

name: Air Blower
description: Sets Tailwind for 5 turns when entering battle.

name: Amphibious
description: Water-type moves gain 1.5x power.

name: Amplifier
description: Sound-based moves now target all foes [Affected moves: Bug Buzz, Chatter, Confide, Disarming Voice, Echoed Voice, Eerie Spell, Grass Whistle, Metal Sound, Noble Roar, Parting Shot, Roar, Round, Screech, Sing, Snore, Supersonic, Uproar].

name: Ancient Idol
description: The Pokemon uses its Defense stat and stages during physical moves and its Special Defense stat during special moves instead of its Attack and Special Attack, respectively.

name: Antarctic Bird
description: Ice- and Flying-type moves gain 1.5x power.

name: Aquatic
description: Adds the Water-type to the Pokemon, in addition to the Pokemon's original type(s).

name: Artillery
description: Beam, pump, cannon, zooka, shot, gun, aura and pulse moves (including Eruption and Water Spout) cannot miss, and single-target moves hit both foes.

name: Aurora Borealis
description: The Pokemon's Ice-type moves gain same-type attack bonus regardless the Pokemon's typing. The Pokemon will take no damage from the hailstorm if it otherwise would.

name: Avenger
description: Boosts the power of the move by 50% if a Pokemon from the user's party has fainted in the previous turn.

name: Bad Luck
description: Other Pokemon cannot land critical hits and have Accuracy stat lowered by 5%.

name: Big Leaves
description: Solar Beam/Blade doesn't need to charge; Synthesis recovers twice as much HP; Growth doubles stat changes; Chlorophyll, Harvest, Leaf Guard and Solar Power are activated.

name: Blitz Boxer
description: Punching moves increase priority by 1.

name: Bone Zone
description: Bone-Based moves ignore immunities and also deal double damage on not very effective.

name: Burnate
description: All Normal-type moves used by the Pokemon to become Fire-type and receive a 20% power boost.

name: Chloroplast
description: This Pokemon's moves behave as if the weather is sunny, regardless of active weather. Does nothing in sunlight, does not boost Fire-type attacks, does not change Weather Ball.

name: Christmas Spirit
description: The Pokemon is protected by a mysterious force that reduces all incoming damage by 50% during a hailstorm.

name: Coil Up
description: The Pokemon enters the battlefield coiled up. Coil: The next time the Pokemon uses a biting move, its priority is increased 1.

name: Crystallize
description: All Rock-type moves used by the Pokemon to become Ice-type and receive a 20% power boost.

name: Deadeye
description: Never misses.

name: Dragonfly
description: Adds the Dragon-type to the Pokemon, in addition to the Pokemon's original type(s). Immune to Ground-type moves.

name: Dragonslayer
description: Increases the damage dealt against Dragon-type Pokemon by 50%.

name: Dreamcatcher
description: Boosts power of moves by 20% for each Pokemon asleep on the field.

name: Earthbound
description: Increases own Ground-type attacks by 25%.

name: Electric Burst
description: The Pokemon's Electric-type moves are boosted by 35%, but the Pokemon takes 10% of damage dealt.

name: Electrocytes
description: Increases the power of Electric-type moves by 25%.

name: Exploit Weakness
description: Increases the power of moves by 25% against targets with status condition.

name: Fatal Precision
description: Super Effective Moves from this Pokemon canet miss and receive a 20% damage boost.

name: Feline Prowess
description: Doubles Special Attack (special Huge Power).

name: Field Explorer
description: Increases the power of field moves by 25%. [Affected moves: Dig, Headbutt, Secret Power, Fly, Cut, Strength, Surf, Waterfall, Rock Climb, Flash, Whirlpool, Dive]

name: Fight Spirit
description: All Normal-type moves used by the Pokemon become Fighting-type and receive a 20% power boost.

name: Flaming Soul
description: Fire-type moves have +1 priority (Fire type Gale Wings).

name: Flock
description: Overgrow for Flying moves.

name: Fort Knox
description: Boosts the Pokemon's Defense stat by +3 when its stats are lowered.

name: Fossilized
description: Only takes half damage from Rock-type moves

name: Frozen Soul
description: Ice-type moves have +1 priority (Ice type Gale Wings).

name: Giant Wings
description: Boosts all air, wing and wind moves by 25%, including Twister, Hurricane and Heat Wave.

name: Grip Pincer
description: Contact moves have 30% chance to trap the foe for two to three turns. If the target is trapped, contact moves bypass target's Defense and accuracy check.

name: Ground Shock
description: Allow Electric-type moves to hit ground type Pokemon.

name: Groundate
description: All Normal-type moves used by the Pokemon to become Ground-type and boosts them by 20%.

name: Grounded
description: Adds the Ground-type to the Pokemon, in addition to the Pokemon's original type(s).

name: Growing Tooth
description: Increases the Attack stat by one stage after using a fang move (Moves: Hyper Fang, Super Fang, Fire Fang, Thunder Fang, Ice Fang, Psychic Fangs, Poison Fang).

name: Half Drake
description: Adds the Dragon-type to the Pokemon, in addition to the Pokemon's original type(s).

name: Haunted Spirit
description: When the Pokemon faints by a damaging move from an opposing Pokemon, the attacker becomes cursed.

name: Hydrate
description: All Normal-type moves used by the Pokemon become Water-type and receive a 20% power boost.

name: Hyper Aggressive
description: Hits twice. 2nd hit does 25% more damage.

name: Hypnotist
description: Increases Hypnosis accuracy by 50%.

name: Ice Age
description: Adds the Ice-type to the Pokemon, in addition to the Pokemon's original type(s).

name: Ice Dew
description: Enemy Ice-type attacks up Atk or SpAtk by +1.

name: Impenetrable
description: Takes no indirect damage.

name: Inflatable
description: When the Pokemon is hit by Fire-type or Flying-type moves, its Defense and Special Defense stats are increased by one stage.

name: Juggernaut
description: Contact moves use 20% of Defense stat in addition to the default stat. Also, cannot be paralyzed.

name: Keen Edge
description: Boosts the power of cutting/slashing moves by 30%. This affects Cut, Slash, False Swipe, Fury Cutter, Aerial Ace, Leaf Blade, Night Slash, Air Slash, X-Scissor, Psycho Cut, Cross Poison, Sacred Sword, Razor Shell, Secret Sword, Solar Blade, Behemoth Blade, Breaking Swipe, Meteor Assault.

name: Lead Coat
description: Triples the Pokemon's weight. Increases the Defense stat by 30%, but decreases Speed stat by 10%.

name: Lets roll
description: Pokemon starts in Defense Curl, boosting the Defense stage by one. Defense Curl effect: Doubles the power of Rollout, Ice Ball, Steamroller and Steel Roller.

name: Liquified
description: Takes half damage from contact moves. Takes 2x damage from Water-type moves.

name: Looter
description: Heals 1/4 HP when defeating an enemy.

name: Loud Bang
description: There is a 10% chance that the opposing Pokemon will become confused when affected by the Pokemon's sound-based damaging moves.

name: Lunar Eclipse
description: The Pokemon's Fairy- and Dark-type moves gain same-type attack bonus regardless the Pokemon's typing. Hypnosis has its Accuracy increased by 50%.

name: Magical Dust
description: When is hit by contact move, it leaves a Magic Powder that adds Psychic-type to the target.

name: Majestic Bird
description: Boosts Special moves by 50%.

name: Majestic Moth
description: Increases the highest stat by one stage upon entering the battlefield.

name: Metallic
description: Adds the Steel-type to the Pokemon, in addition to the Pokemon's original type(s).

name: Molten Down
description: The Pokemon's Fire-type moves become super effective against Rock-type.

name: Momentum
description: Contact moves use Speed stat instead for the damage calculation (counts Speed stage-modifiers).

name: Mountaineer
description: Immune to Rock attacks and Stealth Rocks.

name: Multi Headed
description: Hit two or three times depending on the number of heads with single target moves, dealing 20% or 35% (20% + 15%) more damage. (Doesn't work with multi-hit moves like Comet Punch).

name: Mystic Power
description: All Pokemon's moves gain the same-type attack bonus (STAB) regardless the Pokemon's typing.

name: Nocturnal
description: Boosts Dark by 25%, halves incoming Dark and Fairy-type moves.

name: North Wind
description: Sets Aurora Veil on entry. Immune to Hail damage.

name: Opportunist
description: If target's HP is 50% or below, your single-target damaging moves get priority +1.

name: Overcharge
description: Electric does 2x damage against Electric. Can paralyze Electric-types.

name: Overwhelm
description: The Pokemon can hit Fairy-type Pokemon with Dragon-type moves. Also blocks Intimidate and Scare.

name: Perfectionist
description: Increases critical hit rate by +1 of moves with BP 50 or less. Increases critical hit rate and priority by +1 of moves with BP 25 or less.

name: Permafrost
description: Reduces damage taken from super-effective attacks by 25%.

name: Phantom
description: Adds the Ghost-type to the Pokemon, in addition to the Pokemon's original type(s).

name: Poison Absorb
description: Restore 1/4 HP when hit by Poison-type moves.

name: Poisonate
description: All Normal-type moves used by the Pokemon to become Poison-type and receive a 20% power boost.

name: Power Core
description: The Pokemon uses 25% of its Defense stat during physical moves and Special Defense stat during special moves in addition to the default stat. (Defense and Special Defense stat stages still affects these percentage).

name: Power Fists
description: This Pokemon's punching moves do Special damage, and 30% more.

name: Precise Fist
description: Punching moves have critical rate increased by +1 and have double the chance of secondary effects.

name: Predator
description: Heals 1/4 HP when defeating an enemy.

name: Primal Armor
description: Reduces damage received from Super Effective Attacks by 50%

name: Prism Scales
description: Reduces damage from Special attacks by 30%.

name: Psychic Mind
description: Boosts the power of Psychic-type moves by 25%.

name: Pyromancy
description: Fire-type attacks are five times more likely to inflict a burn.

name: Raging Boxer
description: Punch moves hit twice, with second hit deals 0.5x.

name: Rampage
description: This Pokemon does not need to recharge a move if it KO's on one turn.

name: Raw Wood
description: Only takes half damage from Grass-type moves.

name: Sage Power
description: Automatically locked into the first move chosen, but boosts Special Attack by 1.5x (Gorilla Tactics for Special moves)

name: Sand Song
description: This Pokemon's sound moves become Ground type.

name: Scare
description: When the Pokemon enters the battlefield, it lowers all opposing Pokemon's Special Attack by one stage.

name: Scavenger
description: Heals 1/4 HP when defeating an enemy.

name: Sea Guardian
description: While under the effect of Rain, the Pokemon's highest offensive stat is boosted by +1.

name: Seaweed
description: The Grass-type Pokemon takes neutral damage from Fire-type moves. The Pokemon deals neutral damage against Fire-type Pokemon with Grass-type moves.

name: Self Sufficient
description: Heals 1/16 at the end of every turn.

name: Short Circuit
description: Overgrow for Electric moves

name: Sighting System
description: Moves with 50% or less accuracy always hit, but priority is decreased by 3.

name: Solar Flare
description: The Pokemon's Fire-type moves gain same-type attack bonus regardless the Pokemon's typing. The Pokemon does not need a turn to charge to use Solar Beam and Solar Blade and Morning Sun recovers twice as much HP.

name: Solenoglyphs
description: Biting moves have a 50% chance of badly poisoning the target.

name: Soul Eater
description: Whenever another Pokemon faints, restores 25% of its maximum HP.

name: Soul Linker
description: The attacker will receive any damage taken by the Pokemon and the Pokemon will receive any damage done to the target. The effect won't activate if the one of the affected Pokemon faints.

name: Speed Force
description: Moves that makes contact use 20% of Speed stat in addition to the default stat. (Speed stat stages still affects these percentage)

name: Spider Lair
description: When the Pokemon enters the battle, enemy field gets Sticky Web. [Bug-type Pokemon are immune to Sticky Web]

name: Striker
description:
Boosts kicking moves by 1.3x.
Moves affected by Striker: Blaze Kick, Jump Kick, High Jump Kick, Triple Axel, Triple Kick, Stomp, Mega Kick, Low Kick, Rolling Kick, Trop Kick, Pyro Ball, High Horsepower, Double Kick, Thunderous Kick.

name: Sun Worship
description: While under the effect of Sun, the Pokemon's highest offensive stat is boosted by +1.

name: Sweet Dreams
description: At the end of each turn, each sleeping allies restores HP equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP. The Pokemon on your side of field are immune to opposing Bad Dreams ability.

name: Twisted Dimension
description: Summons Trick Room.

name: Vengeance
description: Always provides a 20% damage boost to Ghost moves. This increases to 50% when at or below 1/3 HP, boosts do not stack.

name: Violent Rush
description: Boosts Speed by 1.5x, Attack by 1.2x on first turn.

name: Weather Control
description: Negates all moves related to weather condition from opposing Pokemon. [Affected moves: Thunder, Blizzard, Solar Beam, Solar Blade, Hurricane, Weather Ball]

name: Whiteout
description: Boosts the power of Ice-type attacks in hail by 50%.

name: Adaptability
description: Increases the STAB Bonus from x1.5 to x2.

name: Aerilate
description: All Normal-type moves used by the Pokemon to become Flying-type and receive a 20% power boost.

name: Aftermath
description: The foe that dealt the final hit loses 1/4 of its maximum HP if the move made physical contact.

name: Air Lock
description: Eliminates the effects of weather.

name: Analytic
description: Boosts move power by 30% when the Pokemon moves last.

name: Anticipation
description: Warns when the foe knows 1-hit KO or super-effective moves.

name: Arena Trap
description: Prevents opposing Pokemon from fleeing.

name: Aroma Veil
description: Protects itself and its allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

name: As One
description: This ability combines the effects of both Calyrex's Unnerve ability and Glastrier's Chilling Neigh ability/Spectrier's Grim Neigh ability.

name: Aura Break
description: The effects of eAurae Abilities are reversed to lower the power of affected moves.

name: Bad Dreams
description: Reduces 1/8 HP of sleeping opposing Pokemon every turn.

name: Ball Fetch
description: If the Pokemon is not holding an item, it will fetch the Poke Ball from the first failed throw of the battle.

name: Battery
description: Powers up ally Pokemon's special moves by 30%.

name: Battle Bond
description: Defeating an opposing Pokemon strengthens the Pokemon's bond with its Trainer (friendship more than 220), and it becomes Ash-Greninja.

name: Beast Boost
description: The Pokemon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokemon.

name: Berserk
description: Boosts the Pokemon's Sp. Atk stat when it takes a hit that causes its HP to become half or less.

name: Bulletproof
description: Protects the Pokemon from some ball and bomb moves.

name: Cheek Pouch
description: Restores HP as well when the Pokemon eats a Berry.

name: Chilling Neigh
description: When the Pokemon knocks out a target, it utters a chilling neigh, which boosts its Attack stat.

name: Chlorophyll
description: When sunny, the Pokemones Speed doubles.

name: Clear Body
description: Prevents other Pokemon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokemon's stats.

name: Cloud Nine
description: Eliminates the effects of weather.

name: Comatose
description: It's always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack without waking up.

name: Competitive
description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat is lowered.

name: Compound Eyes
description: Raises the Pokemones accuracy by 30%.

name: Contrary
description: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

name: Cotton Down
description: When the Pokemon is hit by an attack, it scatters cotton fluff around and lowers the Speed stat of all Pokemon except itself.

name: Curious Medicine
description: When the Pokemon enters a battle, it scatters medicine from its shell, which removes all stat changes from allies.

name: Cursed Body
description: May disable a move used on the Pokemon.

name: Cute Charm
description: The opponent has a 30% chance of being induced with Attract when using an attack, that requires physical contact, against this Pokemon.

name: Damp
description: Prevents the use of explosive moves, such as Self-Destruct, by dampening its surroundings.

name: Dancer
description: When another Pokemon uses a dance move, it can use a dance move following it regardless of its Speed.

name: Dark Aura
description: Powers up each Pokemon's Dark-type moves by 50%.

name: Dauntless Shield
description: Boosts the Pokemon's Defense stat when the Pokemon enters a battle.

name: Dazzling
description: Surprises the opposing Pokemon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.

name: Defiant
description: Boosts the Pokemon's Attack stat sharply when its stats are lowered.

name: Delta Stream
description: Creates the Strong Winds weather. This lasts until the Pokemon exits battle, and weakens moves used on Flying-type Pokemon that would be Super Effective

name: Desolate Land
description: The Pokemon changes the weather to nullify Water-type attacks.

name: Disguise
description: Once per battle, the Pokemon can withstand one damaging attack without receiving any damage. Damage inflicted through entry hazards, weather or status conditions will not break the disguise. Damage from Confusion will break the Disguise. It causes 1/8th of max Hit Point damage when it breaks

name: Download
description: Compares an opposing Pokemon's Defense and Sp. Def stats before raising its own Attack or Sp. Atk statewhichever will be more effective.

name: Dragons Maw
description: Powers up Dragon-type moves by 30%.

name: Drizzle
description: The Pokemon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

name: Drought
description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokemon enters a battle.

name: Dry Skin
description:
Rain: HP will increase by 1/8 of its max HP each turn.
Intense Sunlight: HP will decrease by 1/8 of its max HP each turn.

name: Early Bird
description: The Pokemon awakens from sleep twice as fast as other Pokemon.

name: Effect Spore
description: When a Pokemon with this Ability is hit by a move that makes contact, there is a 10% chance that the attacking Pokemon will become either poisoned, paralyzed, or asleep, with a 3.3% probability each.

name: Electric Surge
description: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokemon enters a battle.

name: Emergency Exit
description: The Pokemon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

name: Fairy Aura
description: Powers up each Pokemon's Fairy-type moves by 50%.

name: Filter
description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken (3/4).

name: Flash Fire
description: This ability makes the Pokemon immune to Fire-type moves and will activate when hit by one. When activated, the power of the Pokemon's Fire-type moves is increased by 50%.

name: Flower Gift
description: Allyes Attack and Special Defence are multiplied by 1.5 during strong sunlight.

name: Flower Veil
description: Ally Grass-type Pokemon are protected from status conditions and the lowering of their stats.

name: Fluffy
description: A Pokemon with Fluffy takes half damage from moves that make contact. It also takes double damage from Fire-type moves.

name: Friend Guard
description: The damage that ally Pokemon receive from attacks is reduced by 25%.

name: Frisk
description: When it enters a battle, the Pokemon can check an opposing Pokemon's held item.

name: Full Belly
description: In the end of the turn Morpeko eats a berry seed from his pouch, returning to Full Belly Mode while restoring 1/6 of its maximum HP.

name: Full Metal Body
description: Prevents other Pokemon's moves or abilities from lowering the Pokemon's stats.

name: Fur Coat
description: Halves the damage from physical moves.

name: Gale Wings
description: Original

name: Galvanize
description: All Normal-type moves used by the Pokemon to become Electric-type and receive a 20% power boost.

name: Gluttony
description: Makes the Pokemon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.

name: Gooey
description: Contact with the Pokemon will lowers its Speed stat.

name: Gorilla Tactics
description: Boosts the Pokemon's Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.

name: Grass Pelt
description: Increases Defense by 50% when battling on Grass or if the move Grassy Terrain is in effect

name: Grassy Surge
description: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokemon enters a battle.

name: Grim Neigh
description: When the Pokemon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Sp. Atk stat.

name: Gulp Missile
description: When using Surf or Dive, it will change into Gulping Form if it has over 50% max HP or Gorging Form if it has less than 50% max HP. If hit afterwards, form reverts and it shoots out its prey to attack, doing 1/4th of opponent's maximum HP in damage. If the Cramorant was in Gulping Form, the opponent's Defense is lowered 1 stage. If the Cramorant was in Gorging Form, the opponent is paralyzed.

name: Guts
description: Attack is increased by 50% when induced with a status (BURN, PARALYZE, SLEEP, POISON, FREEZE). Burnes effect of lowering Attack is not applied.

name: Harvest
description: The Pokemon has a 50% chance of restoring a consumed berry. During sunshine, this chance increases to 100%.

name: Healer
description: At the end of the turn, there is a 30% chance of either Ally being healed from a status condition.

name: Heatproof
description: The heatproof body of the Pokemon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.

name: Heavy Metal
description: Doubles the Pokemon's weight.

name: Honey Gather
description: The Pokemon may gather Honey after a battle.

name: Huge Power
description: Doubles the Pokemon's Attack.

name: Hunger Switch
description: Morpeko changes its form, alternating between its Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of each turn.

name: Hustle
description: Boosts the Attack stat by 50%, but lowers accuracy by 20%.

name: Hydration
description: Heals status conditions every turn if it's raining.

name: Ice Face
description: Has a protective barrier that protects against Physical Attacks once and will change form to Noice Face after breaking. Confusion also breaks the barrier. Setting Hail or being sent out during hail will restore the Ice Face and change form to Ice Face

name: Ice Scales
description: The Pokemon is protected by ice scales, which halve the damage taken from special moves.

name: Imposter
description: The Pokemon transforms itself into the Pokemon it's facing.

name: Infiltrator
description: Passes through the opposing Pokemon's barrier, substitute, and the like and strikes.

name: Innards Out
description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.

name: Insomnia
description: The Pokemon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.

name: Intimidate
description: The Pokemon intimidates opposing Pokemon upon entering battle, lowering their Attack stat.

name: Intrepid Sword
description: Boosts the Pokemon's Attack stat when the Pokemon enters a battle.

name: Iron Fist
description: The power of punching moves is increased by 30%.

name: Justified
description: Dark hits raise Attack.

name: Klutz
description: The Pokemon can't use any held items.

name: Leaf Guard
description: Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.

name: Libero
description: Changes the Pokemon's type to the type of the move it's about to use.

name: Light Metal
description: Halves the Pokemon's weight.

name: Liquid Ooze
description: The oozed liquid has a strong stench, which damages attackers using any draining move.

name: Magic Bounce
description: Reflects non-attacking moves used on the Pokemon back to the attacking Pokemon

name: Magic Guard
description: The Pokemon only takes damage from attacks.

name: Magician
description: The Pokemon steals the held item of a Pokemon it hits with a move.

name: Magnet Pull
description: Prevents Steel-type Pokemon from escaping using its magnetic force.

name: Marvel Scale
description: The Pokemon's marvelous scales boost the Defense stats by 50% if it has a status condition.

name: Mimicry
description: Changes the Pokemon's type depending on the terrain.

name: Minus
description: Boosts SpAtk by 50% with Plus/Minus.

name: Mirror Armor
description: Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokemon receives.

name: Misty Surge
description: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokemon enters a battle.

name: Mold Breaker
description: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

name: Moody
description: Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.

name: Motor Drive
description: Boosts its Speed stat if hit by an Electric-type move instead of taking damage.

name: Moxie
description: Attack is raised by one stage when the Pokemon knocks out another Pokemon

name: Multiscale
description: Reduces damage afflicted to the Pokemon by 50% if at maximum HP

name: Multitype
description: Changes the Pokemon's type to match the Plate or Z-Crystal it holds.

name: Mummy
description: Contact with the Pokemon changes the attacker's Ability to Mummy.

name: Natural Cure
description: All status conditions heal when the Pokemon switches out.

name: Neuroforce
description: Increases the power of Super Effective moves used by this Pokemon by 25%.

name: Neutralizing Gas
description: If the Pokemon with Neutralizing Gas is in the battle, the effects of all Pokemon's abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.

name: No Guard
description: The Pokemon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.

name: Normalize
description: All the Pokemon's moves become Normal type. The power of those moves is boosted by 20%.

name: Oblivious
description: The Pokemon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or falling for taunts.

name: Own Tempo
description: Prevents it from becoming confused.

name: Parental Bond
description: Parent and child each attacks dealing 25% more damage.

name: Pastel Veil
description: Protects the Pokemon and its ally Pokemon from being poisoned.

name: Perish Body
description: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokemon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.

name: Pickpocket
description: Steals an item from an attacker that made direct contact.

name: Pickup
description: The Pokemon may pick up the item an opposing Pokemon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.

name: Pixilate
description: All Normal-type moves used by the Pokemon to become Fairy-type and receive a 20% power boost.

name: Plus
description: Boosts SpAtk by 50% with Plus/Minus.

name: Poison Heal
description: Restores 1/8 HP per turn if the Pokemon is poisoned instead of losing HP.

name: Power Construct
description: At the start of battle or at the end of a turn, if the HP of the Pokemon is below half, other cells gather to aid and it change into its Complete Forme. After the battle, if the Pokemon's HP is above half, it reverts to its original form.

name: Power of Alchemy
description: The Pokemon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

name: Power Spot
description: Just being next to the Pokemon powers up moves.

name: Prankster
description: Gives priority to a status move.

name: Pressure
description: By putting pressure on the opposing Pokemon, it raises their PP usage.

name: Primordial Sea
description: The Pokemon changes the weather to nullify Fire-type attacks.

name: Prism Armor
description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken by 25%.

name: Propeller Tail
description: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokemon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

name: Protean
description: Changes the Pokemon's type to the type of the move it's about to use.

name: Psychic Surge
description: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokemon enters a battle.

name: Punk Rock
description: Boosts the power of sound-based moves. The Pokemon also takes half the damage from these kinds of moves.

name: Pure Power
description: Using its pure power, the Pokemon doubles its Attack.

name: Queenly Majesty
description: Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokemon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.

name: Quick Draw
description: At the start of each turn, this Pokemon has a 30% chance of moving first in the Speed Priority Bracket

name: Quick Feet
description: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokemon has a status condition.

name: Rattled
description: Dark-, Ghost-, and Bug-type moves scare the Pokemon and boost its Speed stats.

name: Receiver
description: The Pokemon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

name: Reckless
description: Powers up moves that have recoil and crash damage by 20%.

name: Refrigerate
description: All Normal-type moves used by the Pokemon to become Ice-type and receive a 20% power boost.

name: Regenerator
description: Restores 1/3 HP when withdrawn from battle.

name: Ripen
description: Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.

name: RKS System
description: Changes the Pokemon's type to match the memory disc it holds.

name: Rock Head
description: Protects the Pokemon from recoil damage.

name: Sand Force
description: Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves by 30% in a sandstorm.

name: Sand Rush
description: Boosts the Pokemon's Speed stat by 33% in a sandstorm.

name: Sand Spit
description: The Pokemon creates a sandstorm when it's hit by an attack.

name: Sand Stream
description: The Pokemon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.

name: Sand Veil
description: Boosts the Pokemon's evasiveness in a sandstorm by 20%.

name: Sap Sipper
description: Immune to Grass-type moves. Instead of being hit by Grass-type moves, it boosts its Attack or Sp. Attack stat (which is higher).

name: Schooling
description: Changes the Pokemon's form when it is Level 20 and has more than 25% Hit Points. When Hit Points drop below 25%, it changes back to Solo Form

name: Scrappy
description: The Pokemon can hit: Ghost-type Pokemon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.

name: Serene Grace
description: Boosts the likelihood of additional effects occurring when attacking.

name: Shadow Shield
description: Reduces damage inflicted on this Pokemon when at max Hit Points by 50%. It is not affected by moves or abilities that would ignore the ability such as Mold Breaker, Moongeist Beam or Sunsteel Strike

name: Shadow Tag
description: This Pokemon steps on the opposing Pokemon's shadow to prevent it from escaping.

name: Shed Skin
description: Every turn, it has a 1 in 3 chance of healing from a status condition (BURN, PARALYZE, SLEEP, POISON, FREEZE).

name: Sheer Force
description: Moves with a secondary effect are increased in power by 30% but lose their secondary effect

name: Shields Down
description: Original

name: Simple
description: The stat changes the Pokemon receives are doubled.

name: Skill Link
description: Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.

name: Slow Start
description: For five turns, the Pokemon's Attack and Speed stats are halved, but restores its stats after these five turns.

name: Slush Rush
description: Boosts the Pokemon's Speed by 33% in a hailstorm

name: Sniper
description: Power of critical-hit moves is increased to 225% rather than 150%.

name: Snow Cloak
description: Boosts the Pokemon's evasiveness in a hailstorm by 20%.

name: Snow Warning
description: The Pokemon summons a hailstorm when it enters a battle.

name: Solid Rock
description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken (3/4).

name: Soul-Heart
description: Boosts its Sp. Atk stat every time a Pokemon faints.

name: Soundproof
description: Soundproofing gives the Pokemon full immunity to all sound-based moves.

name: Speed Boost
description: Its Speed stat is boosted every turn.

name: Stakeout
description: Doubles the damage dealt to the target's replacement if the target switches out.

name: Stall
description: The Pokemon moves after all other Pokemon do.

name: Stalwart
description: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokemon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

name: Stance Change
description: The Pokemon changes its form to Blade Forme when it uses an attack move and changes to Shield Forme when it uses King's Shield.

name: Steadfast
description: Speed raises by one level every time the Pokemon flinches.

name: Steam Engine
description: Boosts the Pokemon's Speed stat drastically each time it is hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.

name: Stench
description: This Pokemon's attacks without a chance to flinch gain a 10% chance to flinch.

name: Sticky Hold
description: Items held by the Pokemon are stuck fast and cannot be removed by other Pokemon.

name: Strong Jaw
description: The Pokemon's strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves. [Now affects Bug Bite, Super Fang, Deathroll]

name: Sturdy
description: It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.

name: Suction Cups
description: This Pokemon uses suction cups to stay in one spot to negate all moves and items that force switching out.

name: Super Luck
description: Raises the critical-hit ratio of moves by one level.

name: Surge Surfer
description: Doubles the Pokemon's Speed stat on Electric Terrain.

name: Sweet Veil
description: Prevents itself and ally Pokemon from falling asleep.

name: Swift Swim
description: Doubles speed in rain.

name: Symbiosis
description: The Pokemon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.

name: Synchronize
description: The attacker will receive the same status condition if it inflicts a burn, poison, or paralysis to the Pokemon.

name: Tangled Feet
description: Pokemones evasion raises one level when Confused.

name: Tangling Hair
description: Contact with the Pokemon will lowers its Speed stat

name: Technician
description: Powers up the Pokemon's weaker moves with BP 60 or less.

name: Telepathy
description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

name: Thick Fat
description: The Pokemon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

name: Tinted Lens
description: The Pokemon can use "not very effective" moves to deal regular damage.

name: Tough Claws
description: Powers up moves by 30% that make direct contact.

name: Trace
description: When it enters a battle, the Pokemon copies an opposing Pokemon's Ability.

name: Transistor
description: Powers up Electric-type moves by 50%.

name: Triage
description: Gives priority to healing moves.

name: Truant
description: The Pokemon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.

name: Unaware
description: Foees stat modifications are ignored.

name: Unburden
description: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokemon's held item is used or lost.

name: Unnerve
description: Unnerves opposing Pokemon and makes them unable to eat Berries or use healing move (but doesn't prevent Leech seed, HP-draining moves, healing items effects ...).

name: Unseen Fist
description: If the Pokemon uses moves that make direct contact, it can attack the target even if the target protects itself.

name: Victory Star
description: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself by 10%.

name: Vital Spirit
description: The Pokemon is full of vitality, and that prevents it from falling asleep.

name: Volt Absorb
description: The Pokemon heals up to 1/4 of its maximum Hit Points when hit with Electric-type moves.

name: Wandering Spirit
description: The Pokemon exchanges Abilities with a Pokemon that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.

name: Water Absorb
description: The Pokemon heals up to 1/4 of its maximum Hit Points when hit with Water-type moves.

name: Water Bubble
description: Water Bubble halves the damage dealt to the Pokemon with this Ability by Fire-type attacks and doubles the power of Water-type moves used by the Pokemon with this Ability. It also prevents the Pokemon with the Ability from being burned.

name: Weak Armor
description: Physical attacks to the Pokemon lower its Defense and Sp. Defense stats but sharply raise its Speed stat.

name: White Smoke
description: The Pokemon is protected by its white smoke, which prevents other Pokemon from lowering its stats

name: Wimp Out
description: The Pokemon cowardly switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

name: Wonder Guard
description: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the Pokemon.

name: Wonder Skin
description: Makes non-damaging moves that are targeted at this Pokemon have the accuracy of 50%.

name: Bad Company
description: Prevents self lowering stat drops and recoil.
